thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: radu argatu
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por radu argatu

author: radu argatu
title: radu argatu
text:
All the reviews are true. It is a very professional company with very helpful staff. The cars are new and the All Inclusive option is amazing.
Just be advised that they have a "no cash" policy so you will need a credit card for them to perform a small charge of about 70 euros which it will act as a fuel deposit.
I will definitely use their services again once I return to Portugal.
Thank you for everything.
